colors_solid_button_labels.label: Primary label
colors_solid_button_labels.info: Used as foreground color on accent colors.

colors_outline_button_labels.label: Secondary background
colors_outline_button_labels.info: Used for solid secondary button background.

colors_secondary_button_labels.label: Secondary label
colors_secondary_button_labels.info: Used as foreground color on secondary colors.

colors_tertiary_button_labels.label: Tertiary label
colors_tertiary_button_labels.info: Used as foreground color on tertiary transparent background.

colors_text.label: Text
colors_text.info: Used as foreground color on background colors.

colors_sub-text.label: Secondary text
colors_sub-text.info: Used as secondary foreground color on background colors.

colors_text_dark.label: Text (dark mode)
colors_text_dark.info: Used as foreground color on background colors in dark mode.

colors_background_2.label: Light 2
colors_background_2.info: Used for Footer, Steps, Interactive section, Testimonials, and light blocks on pages.

colors_background_3.label: Dark 1
colors_background_3.info: Used for Footer, Steps, Interactive section.

colors_background_5.label: Light 3
colors_background_5.info: Used for Footer and Collection list.

colors_background_announcement_bar_1.label: Announcement bar dark
colors_background_announcement_bar_1.info: You can choose the color scheme in the section's settings.

colors_background_overlay.label: Overlay
colors_background_overlay.info: Used for Interactive section, Product slider, Collection page, Artcile page and Fullscreen aside promo block.

colors_accent.label: Accent color
colors_accent.info: Used for links text decoration, menu icons.

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_font_card.label: Heading font
type_header_font_card.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_text_font_card.label: Description font
type_text_font_card.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_subtitle_font.label: Font
type_subtitle_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_button_font.label: Font
type_button_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_menu_font.label: Font
type_header_menu_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_footer_menu_font.label: Links font
type_footer_menu_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_popups_heading_font.label: Heading popups font
type_popups_heading_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_popups_text_font.label: Text popup font
type_popups_text_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

custom_colors.label: Custom colors
custom_colors.info: Like "Red: #ff0000". Each color must be in its own line.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

pagination_type.label: Pagination type
pagination_type.info: Pagination type for pages of collections and blogs.

open_new_tab.label: Open external links in a new tab

section_under_menu.label: Section under menu
section_under_menu.info: Works when the section is the first

heading_position.label: Heading position
heading_position.info: It is recommended to select the bottom position if the 'Section under menu' option is enabled

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

image_width.label: Image width
image_width.info: Only on devices with a screen width of 1360px and more.

image_width.label: Image width
image_width.info: Only on devices with a screen width of 1360px and more.

image_width.label: Image width
image_width.info: Only on devices with a screen width of 1360px and more.

adapt_height_background_image.label: Adapt section height to background image size

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

adapt_height_background_image.label: Adapt section height to background image size

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

collage_type.label: Animation type
collage_type.info: Maximum 7 images for animation type "On cursor", 10 images for animation type "Vertical marquee"

image_before.label: Image before
image_before.info: Both pictures must be added in order for the comparison to appear.

show_view_all.label: Enable "Read All" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

show_image.label: Enable featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 21:9 aspect ratio.

image.label: Image
image.info: The picture will be shown when 'Enable image' is checked.

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: A heading is required to display the menu.

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__9.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__8.info: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](/admin/settings/legal).

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: Main menu is displayed in the header on desktop devices and in the hamburger menu on mobile devices.

menu_2.label: Fullscreen menu
menu_2.info: Fullscreen menu is displayed only on desktop devices.

show_collection_card.label: Show collection
show_collection_card.info: If this option is disabled, settings below will not work.

show_items.label: Show popular items
show_items.info: If this option is disabled, settings below will not work.

show_articles.label: Show articles
show_articles.info: If this option is disabled, settings below will not work.

mega_menu_trigger.label: Trigger
mega_menu_trigger.info: Write the exact name of the link with the submenu. For more information, visit [the documentation page.](https://apparentcollective.com/help-center/documentation/sydney)

trigger-open-delay.label: Time delay for a trigger open

trigger-close-delay.label: Time delay for a trigger close

manual-selector.label: CSS selector for manual trigger
manual-selector.info: If the html element has buttons or links inside, then clicking on them will not work.

overlay-close.label: Click overlay to close
overlay-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user clicks on overlay

esc-close.label: Press ESC to close
esc-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user presses ESC key

f4-close.label: Press F4 to close
f4-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user presses F4 key

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio.

paragraph.content: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections.](/admin/collections)

image_products.label: Main image
image_products.info: This image is displayed on the All Products page and when the Collection image is empty

collection_individual.label: Collection with collection image
collection_individual.info: You can select a collection and assign it a separate featured image. For example, Sale collection.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https:\/\/shopify.dev\/themes\/product-merchandising\/recommendations)

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

image_width.label: Image width
image_width.info: The width works if in the Image ratio select Adapt to image

countdown_heading.label: Text
countdown_heading.info: Show text when countdown is completed

paragraph.content: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

page.label: Page
page.info: Note that adding a contact page will not display the contact form. The contact form is a separate section.

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

filter.label: Enable filter
filter.info: Filter by product type. You can add a product type in Shopify admin. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/details/product-type)

subheading__1.label: Subheading 1
subheading__1.info: This value is only shown on the simple layout

subheading__2.label: Subheading 2
subheading__2.info: This value is only shown on the simple layout

image.label: Image
image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

slide_text.label: Text
slide_text.info: Recommended to choose text with the same number of lines for a better experience.

image.label: Image
image.info: Minimum resolution 620 x 662px in portrait orientation recommended. Images can be cropped for parallax effect.

parallax_video.label: Video
parallax_video.content: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected. Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL.

button_style.label: Button style
button_style.info: The inverse option is for the overlay image type

height.label: Aspect ratio
height.info: "Adapt to video" only works for Shopify-hosted video

paragraph.content: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

video_muted.label: Mute video
video_muted.info: If autoplay is enabled, the sound of the video will be muted.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.
